      static double CompositionalEstimate.HgMin(ProbDist pd, GainFunction gf, java.util.Set<java.lang.String> guessDomain)
      Returns Hg^min(pd) = - log min { pd[x] g(w, x) | x in X, w in W, pd[x] g(w, x) != 0 }.
      static double CompositionalEstimate.HMinInf(ProbDist pd)
      Returns H^min(pd) = - log min { pd[x] | x in support(pd) }.
